title: Anyone have a PBE account? would like help with inputting some Ashe feedback thoughts :L
body:
"Anyone have a PBE account? would like help with inputting some Ashe feedback thoughts :L"

just this basically >,< i've been applying for a account on the pbe for over a month now, but still no luck.

would really appreciate if someone could help me post a message on the boards in my stead regarding the ashe rework that just came out today :0

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/6BBcWPLy-ashe-update-feedback-thread#

the message i want to send is simply this
'the new Focus system on Q (Rangers Focus) besides from the active/consume steroid feels very stale gameplay wise as it has almost zero interaction with her kit or surroundings at all except for visually holding a Focus counter of her stacks.

could this possibly have maybe another function in the future? an few examples i can give of some Passive aa counter's that apply a small function are Diana's 3rd Attack, Jax's Attack Speed stacks, Draven's Q, Graves Passive, Poppy's W/passive. list goes on for awhile actually if you think about it hard enough.

it's just i've been suing Ashe for quite a long time so i know and felt the differences in the utility of other champions passives compared to her own (old focus and the updated old focus). when i see how rangers focus functions outside of the 18second cooldown of the active ability i see incentive to have the focus counter being displayed as its not providing any sort of extra function.

where on the other hand champion abilities such as like Jinx's Minigun form/Q Jax's passive attack speed increase stacks or Graves Passive/Grit. hell even Yasuo's flow meter. those have interesting interaction which coexist with their kits and gameplay design.

the Ranger focus when compared to these doesnt... do anything besides that of giving the ability add more damage to an Attack speed steroid.
IF anything her Focus is exactly like Volibears W except.. Volibear gets attack speed upon reaching max stacks and for maintaining his stacks. Ashe does not.

the only thing i can come up with would be something like each stack provide her with a stat increase and upon activation this would double
so for example. lets just say attack speed as a stat.

20/30/40/50/60% Attack speed : active
10/15/20/25/30%  Attack speed : Passive. the percent values shown would by divided by 5 (10% rank 1 = 2% per stack with 10% being max)

the interaction would be all focus stacks consumed and unable to stack focus for the duration of the active
-

another feature could be something like lucians cooldown decrease as Ashe has some high cooldowns without very much upfront damage coming from her own abilities as its more about how they scale with the items she obtains later on in the game.

a comparison would be varus's abilities. although he is spec'd in a different manner. his ratio's, quick burst (w and base numbers) and range/utility of his abilities simply seem to me.. outclass this ashe's skillset when it comes down to those specific factors (Cooldown, utility, damage)

i'm not saying 'make her at least varus level in terms of that' i'm just raising my concerns that i think the high Cooldown on Q not to mention the W damage ratio seem a little lack luster.

back onto the Q active 'Consumes all Focus to grant 20/30/40/50/60% Attack Speed and increase Frost Shot's slow by 20% for 4 seconds'

i personally think the increase in effectiveness in the slow/New Passive/Frost shot should be moved into the W whereas hitting multiple arrows would increase the slow's power weather its duration or the strength of the slow itself.

anyways that's i have on the matter. i think the rework is a great step to increasing the Ashe's value as a carry and look forward to this coming to live :D

great job! <3

TheSomnangMao


If this post is off-topic could someone please redirect this to where it may be better served?

replies.body:
I thought that OCE didn't have a PBE?

And in addition to that, how are you able to provide such detailed feedback when you apparently haven't even played the new Ashe yet? Everything's still on paper, if that's so, and it may turn out that it's a lot more fluid and interactive in action.

Just saying.

Anyway, this is off-topic for this board. To be honest, I'm not really sure *where* you'd put it here, as we have no boards for PBE content/feedback. Thus I say you put it is [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).
